# Contrast Angular Bootstrap Panel

Contrast Angular Bootstrap Panels are the flexible and extensible content containers with multiple variants, which include a wide variety of content, contextual background colors, and powerful display options. Panels are similar to cards, but they don't include media.



## Importing the Contrast Angular Bootstrap Panel Module

To use the Contrast Angular Bootstrap Panel component in your project you need to import `PanelModule`.

```ts
import {PanelModule } from 'cdbangular';
```

## Panel with Dropdown

Alongside the `CDBPanel` component, we use other Contrast Angular Components, these components are, the `CDBPanelTitle` component to write titles in your pane, the `CDBPanelText` component to write texts or messages in your pane, the `CDBPaneImage`  component for your pane images. 

To embed the Contrast Angular Bootstrap Dropdown in our Panel, we nest the Dropdown component, [CDBDropDown](https://www.devwares.com/docs/contrast/angular/components/dropdown), in the `CDBPanel` component. 

![Angular Bootstrap Panel Component](./images/panelwithdropdown.png)

###### HTML
```html
<CDBPanel>
    <CDBPane>
        <CDBPaneImage size="md"
            src="https://media.istockphoto.com/photos/beautiful-woman-wearing-brown-curly-hairstyle-picture-id495006065?s=170x170" ></CDBPaneImage>
        <div class="ml-3">
            <CDBPanelTitle>Warren Briggs</CDBPanelTitle>
            <CDBPanelText [small]=true>Chicago</CDBPanelText>
        </div>
        <CDBDropDown cdbDropdown class="ml-auto">
            <CDBDropDownToggle color="white">
                <CDBIcon class="text-[muted]=true" [fas]=true icon="ellipsis-h" ></CDBIcon>
            </CDBDropDownToggle>
            <CDBDropDownMenu>
                <CDBDropDownItem [disabled]=true>Edit Profile</CDBDropDownItem>
                <CDBDropDownItem [divider]=true ></CDBDropDownItem>
                <CDBDropDownItem>Action 1</CDBDropDownItem>
                <CDBDropDownItem>Action 2</CDBDropDownItem>
            </CDBDropDownMenu>
        </CDBDropDown>
    </CDBPane>
    <CDBPanelText class="my-3">
        Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod
        tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam,
        quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo
    </CDBPanelText>
    <CDBPanelText [small]=true>
        <CDBIcon [far]=true icon="thumbs-up" ></CDBIcon>127 likes
        <CDBIcon class="ml-2" [far]=true icon="comment" ></CDBIcon>54 comments
    </CDBPanelText>
</CDBPanel>
```


## Panel with Users

![Angular Bootstrap Panel with Users](./images/panelwithusers.png)

###### HTML
```html
<CDBPanel class="p-0">
    <CDBCardImage cdbClass="img-fluid"
        src="https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2015/04/23/22/00/tree-736885__340.jpg" ></CDBCardImage>
    <div class="m-3">
        <CDBPanelTitle tag="h2">Bristol</CDBPanelTitle>
        <CDBPanelText class="my-3">
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod
            tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
        </CDBPanelText>
        <CDBPaneImage size="sm"
            src="https://media.istockphoto.com/photos/beautiful-woman-wearing-brown-curly-hairstyle-picture-id495006065?s=170x170" ></CDBPaneImage>
        <CDBPaneImage size="sm" class="mx-2"
            src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcQ7ntUU7AzmOxa5HB8zS83sa-JFHEfZJAoI2A&usqp=CAU" ></CDBPaneImage>
        <CDBPaneImage size="sm"
            src="data:image/jpeg;base64," ></CDBPaneImage>
    </div>
</CDBPanel>
```

## Panel with Label

In this tutorial section, we create our panel label with the Contrast Angular Bootstrap Badge, nest the [CDBDropDown](https://www.devwares.com/docs/contrast/angular/components/dropdown) component in the `CDBPanel` component. With this, our panel now has badges in it, which can serve as labels.

![Angular Bootstrap Panel with Label](./images/panelwithlabel.png)

###### HTML
```html
<CDBPanel>
    <CDBBadge color="dark" [flat]=true>Label 1</CDBBadge>
    <CDBBadge color="warning" class="mx-1" [flat]=true>Label 2</CDBBadge>
    <CDBBadge color="danger" [flat]=true>Label 3</CDBBadge>
    <div class="mt-3 d-flex align-items-center">
        <CDBPanelTitle tag="h3">Moon Fever</CDBPanelTitle>
        <CDBIcon class="ml-auto" [fas]=true icon="chart-line" ></CDBIcon>
    </div>
    <CDBPanelText class="my-3">
        Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod
        tempor incididunt
    </CDBPanelText>
    <CDBPaneImage size="sm"
        src="data:image/jpeg;base64," ></CDBPaneImage>
    <CDBPaneImage size="sm"
        src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcQ7ntUU7AzmOxa5HB8zS83sa-JFHEfZJAoI2A&usqp=CAU" ></CDBPaneImage>
</CDBPanel>
```

## Pane List



![Angular Bootstrap Pane List](./images/panellist.png)

###### HTML
```html
<CDBPanel>
    <CDBPane>
        <CDBPanelText [muted]=true>My Messages</CDBPanelText>
        <CDBDropDown cdbDropdown class="ml-auto">
            <CDBDropDownToggle color="white">
                <CDBIcon class="text-muted" [fas]=true icon="ellipsis-h" ></CDBIcon>
            </CDBDropDownToggle>
            <CDBDropDownMenu>
                <CDBDropDownItem [disabled]=true>Edit Profile</CDBDropDownItem>
                <CDBDropDownItem [divider]=true ></CDBDropDownItem>
                <CDBDropDownItem>Action 1</CDBDropDownItem>
                <CDBDropDownItem>Action 2</CDBDropDownItem>
            </CDBDropDownMenu>
        </CDBDropDown>
    </CDBPane>
    <CDBPane class="mt-4">
        <CDBPaneImage size="md"
            src="https://media.istockphoto.com/photos/beautiful-woman-wearing-brown-curly-hairstyle-picture-id495006065?s=170x170" ></CDBPaneImage>
        <div class="ml-3">
            <CDBPanelTitle>Warren Briggs</CDBPanelTitle>
            <CDBPanelText [small]=true>Cooking</CDBPanelText>
        </div>
        <CDBPanelText [muted]=true [small]=true class="ml-auto">5mins ago</CDBPanelText>
    </CDBPane>
    <CDBPane class="mt-4">
        <CDBPaneImage size="md"
            src="data:image/jpeg;base64," ></CDBPaneImage>
        <div class="ml-3">
            <CDBPanelTitle>Lu Chen</CDBPanelTitle>
            <CDBPanelText [small]=true>I'll call you back</CDBPanelText>
        </div>
        <CDBPanelText [muted]=true [small]=true class="ml-auto">27mins ago</CDBPanelText>
    </CDBPane>
    <CDBPane class="mt-4">
        <CDBPaneImage size="md"
            src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcQ7ntUU7AzmOxa5HB8zS83sa-JFHEfZJAoI2A&usqp=CAU" ></CDBPaneImage>
        <div class="ml-3">
            <CDBPanelTitle>Sam</CDBPanelTitle>
            <CDBPanelText [small]=true>See you at school</CDBPanelText>
        </div>
        <CDBPanelText [muted]=true [small]=true class="ml-auto">active</CDBPanelText>
    </CDBPane>
    <CDBPane class="mt-4">
        <CDBPaneImage size="md"
            src="data:image/jpeg;base64,[faS][FAS][far]" ></CDBPaneImage>
        <div class="ml-3">
            <CDBPanelTitle>Danny</CDBPanelTitle>
            <CDBPanelText [small]=true>Yeah</CDBPanelText>
        </div>
        <CDBPanelText [muted]=true [small]=true class="ml-auto">busy</CDBPanelText>
    </CDBPane>
    <CDBPane class="mt-4">
        <CDBPaneImage size="md"
            src="data:image/jpeg;base64," ></CDBPaneImage>
        <div class="ml-3">
            <CDBPanelTitle>Lilah Loselev</CDBPanelTitle>
            <CDBPanelText [small]=true>Okay sir</CDBPanelText>
        </div>
        <CDBPanelText [muted]=true [small]=true class="ml-auto">1hr ago</CDBPanelText>
    </CDBPane>
</CDBPanel>
```

## Panel with Progress

In this tutorial we use other Contrast Angular Bootstrap Components alongside the `CDBPanel` component. These components are the [CDBDropDown](https://www.devwares.com/docs/contrast/angular/components/dropdown) for our panel dropdowns, [CDBProgress](https://www.devwares.com/docs/contrast/angular/components/progress) to have progress bars in our panels, [CDBPane](https://www.devwares.com/docs/contrast/angular/components/pane), and the [CDBIcon](https://www.devwares.com/docs/contrast/angular/components/icon) component for icons in our panels. Check out the docs to get more insight. 

![Angular Bootstrap Panel with Progress](./images/panelwithprogress.png)

###### HTML
```html
<CDBPanel>
    <CDBPane>
        <CDBPaneImage size="md"
            src="https://media.istockphoto.com/photos/beautiful-woman-wearing-brown-curly-hairstyle-picture-id495006065?s=170x170" ></CDBPaneImage>
        <div class="ml-3">
            <CDBPanelTitle>Warren Briggs</CDBPanelTitle>
            <CDBPanelText [small]=true>Chicago</CDBPanelText>
        </div>
        <CDBDropDown cdbDropdown class="ml-auto">
            <CDBDropDownToggle color="white">
                <CDBIcon class="text-muted" [fas]=true icon="ellipsis-h" ></CDBIcon>
            </CDBDropDownToggle>
            <CDBDropDownMenu>
                <CDBDropDownItem [disabled]=true>Edit Profile</CDBDropDownItem>
                <CDBDropDownItem [divider]=true ></CDBDropDownItem>
                <CDBDropDownItem>Action 1</CDBDropDownItem>
                <CDBDropDownItem>Action 2</CDBDropDownItem>
            </CDBDropDownMenu>
        </CDBDropDown>
    </CDBPane>
    <CDBPanelText class="mt-3" [small]=true>Instagram</CDBPanelText>
    <CDBProgress value=75 height=5></CDBProgress>
    <CDBPanelText class="mt-2" [small]=true>Facebook</CDBPanelText>
    <CDBProgress value=60 height=5></CDBProgress>
    <CDBPanelText class="mt-2" [small]=true>Twitter</CDBPanelText>
    <CDBProgress value=45 height=5></CDBProgress>
</CDBPanel>
```

## API Reference: Contrast Panel Properties


This section will build on your information about the props you get to use with the Contrast Angular Bootstrap Pane component. You will find out what these props do, their default values, and how you would use them in your code.

The table below lists other prop options of the `CDBPanel` component.

| Name            | Type        | Default      |   Description| Example      |
| :------------- | :----------: | -----------: | :----------: | -----------: |
| class      | String       |              |Adds custom classes	      |     class="myClass" |
| color        | string      |         | Sets the color of the panel | color="#000" |


## API Reference: Contrast Panel Title Properties

The table below lists other prop options of the `CDBPanelTitle` component.

| Name            | Type        | Default      |   Description| Example      |
| :------------- | :----------: | -----------: | :----------: | -----------: |
| class      | String       |              |Adds custom classes	      |     class="myClass" |


## API Reference: Contrast Panel Text Properties

The table below lists other prop options of the `CDBPanelText` component.

| Name            | Type        | Default      |   Description| Example      |
| :------------- | :----------: | -----------: | :----------: | -----------: |
| class      | String       |              |Adds custom classes	      |     class="myClass" |
| small            | Boolean       | false          | Uses html `small` as component's tag | small=true |
| muted            | Boolean       | false          | Mutes the text color | muted=true |
